attributes.action: STOP THE PLANNING PERMISSION FOR A BIO MASS BURNER IN ARTIGARVAN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WE DO NOT WANT PLANNING PERMISSION TO BE GIVEN FOR  A  BIO MASS BURNER IN OUR VILLAGE. ARTIGARVAN IS SITUATED OUTSIDE STRABANE IN A ROLLING COUNTRYSIDE AREA . STRABANE A LOCAL TOWN HAS A SMOKE FREE ZONE ENFORCEMENT OUR AIR QUALITY WILL SUFFER AS WILL THE QUALITY OF OUR COUNTYSIDE WITH SUCH AN ENVIRONMENTAL HAZARD ON OUR DOOR STEP WE ARE NOT ADVERSE TO CHANGE BUT FEEL THE CENTRE OF OUR VILLAGE IS NOT THE PLACE TO PUT IT . WE ALSO FEEL THE INFRASTUCTURE OF THE LOCAL ROAD NETWORK WILL BE INCAPABLE OF COPING WITH THE TRUCKS AS THERE IS NO STAGING AREA FOR THESE TRUCKS WHILE THEY ARE WAITING TO BE OFF LOADED THEREFORE WE FEEL THAT THIS PLANNING APPLICATION SHOULD NOT BE ALLOWED REF ;J2008/0177/F

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive as appropriate.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
